# ci-gates

CLI tool. Run via `pnpm <command>` from the workspace root.

## Package Overview

✅ Has Tests

## Usage

```bash
pnpm ci-gates
```

## Scripts

| Script | Command |
|---|---|
| `test` | `vitest run` |

## Architecture

CLI tool (Commander.js). Commands and capabilities are registered in `src/`. Use `pnpm <bin>` to run.

## Testing

Run tests:

```bash
pnpm test
```

## Related Packages

- `afenda-crud`
- `afenda-typescript-config`

## Contributing

### Development Workflow

1. Make changes to source files
2. Run `pnpm lint:fix` to fix linting issues
3. Run `pnpm type-check` to verify types

### Code Quality

- All code must pass ESLint checks
- All code must pass TypeScript type checking
